name: Hexamoon Guardians
overview: Hexamoon Guardians is a game divided into 2 different parts, one in an adventure part in which the story takes place and the other are the missions in a tactical RPG style since the player controls the robot and got a limited number of square movement range. STORY: During the 21st century a high school student is receiving tuturial classes during the holidays after having bad grades, but after his hours of study he goes to spend some free time resting until his childhood friend Hazuki appears and when they are going to their high school. the sky suddenly broke due to a strange experiment that an evil corporation is doing and some pillars came out from the ground and make a circle round them and due to that energy a crystal come down from the broke in the sky with a girl inside it, the crystal broke and the girl falls to the ground and they try to help her. After a few moments some giant robots appears and the mysterious girl wakes up, she realize of the danger they are in and took the boy hand and give him the power to pilot with her a giant robot, meanwhile Hazuki falls to the floor far from them. Now is your turn to try to stop the evil plans and defeat them!.
